name: Daily Crypto Mean Reversion BB-RSI
description: Intermediate mean-reverting strategy trading daily candles of Bitcoin and Ethereum using 20-period Bollinger Bands (±2σ) with 14-period RSI. Longs are opened when price closes below the lower band and RSI <30; shorts when price closes above the upper band and RSI >70. Positions are sized to risk 2 % of equity. A 1.5 % fixed stop-loss and 2 % take-profit are attached; positions are also exited earlier when price reverts to the Bollinger mid-line or RSI returns to 45-55 (handled inside the signal component).
